title: Lexington/Fayette County, KY Median Household Income, 2017-2022
info: This map shows median household income (MHI) in all Lexington/Fayette County census tracts for the years 2017-2022, with a slider bar allowing the user to toggle between years, and hovering tooltips showing the adjusted MHI for each census tract. Data is from American Community Survey 5-year estimates, and MHI was adjusted to 2022 dollars for all years except 2022 using the Bureau of Labor Statistic Inflation Calculator.
author: Conley Kinkead
